description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Sales_ItemObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Sales_ItemObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Sales_ItemObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Sales Item for update only purposes

Basic_Sales_Item_Data.description: Sales Item ID.  This is the Sales Item unique identifier

validation.validation: Sales item name is already used.
